## Validate.toConditionKey() function

Converts a string to a [ConditionKey](./ts-res.conditionkey.md) if it is a valid condition key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionKey(key: string): Result<ConditionKey>;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionKey](./ts-res.conditionkey.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionKey](./ts-res.conditionkey.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
